alert.note: Alert for Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 6:26PM MDT until June 18 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL ZIEBACH COUNTY... At 626 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles southeast of Red Elm to 4 miles southwest of Lantry to 9 miles southwest of Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dupree, Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8, Thunder Butte and South Eagle Butte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
